data: {"generalSituation":"The easterly airstream now affecting the coast of Guangdong will moderate gradually in the next couple of days. The weather will be relatively humid over the region and it will be warm during the day. A cold front is expected to move across the coastal areas of southern China on Saturday. Winds will strengthen gradually and temperatures will fall appreciably over the region during the weekend. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon associated with the cold front, it will be cold in the morning and at night over inland areas early next week. Besides, the tropical cyclone now over the seas east of the Philippines will slightly intensify and move across the central and southern parts of the Philippines in the next couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260205","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East force 3.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods.
